author: @choudarysaab7206
text: Absolutely wrong information about Business Analyst role . A BA is a bridge between technical and business people. A BA writes the user stories along with product manager in agile environment. Data analyst prepares the data, process the data , analyze the data and present the data in dashboards to stakeholders that help in data driven decision making .

author: @malcorub
text: I work for a fortune 10 healthcare company (not the one Alex works for) and my team functions as analyst, but we all have the titles (SR.) Healthcare Economics Consultants.  We use Tableau, SAS and SQL Server as well as other internal tools.  The education requirements are usually non technical degrees, such as Economics, Statistics, Finance, Health Administration, Mathematics or related field.
